verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is my shepherd: <S%H7462><s%> I shall lack nothing. <S%H2637><s%>
He makes me lie down <S%H7257><s%> in green <S%H1877><s%> pastures. <S%H4999><s%> He leads <S%H5095><s%> me beside still <S%H4496><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>
He restores <S%H7725><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%> He guides <S%H5148><s%> me in the paths <S%H4570><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> for his name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake.

Even though I walk <S%H3212><s%> through the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the shadow of death, <S%H6757><s%> I will fear <S%H3372><s%> no evil, <S%H7451><s%> for you are with me. <S%H7626><s%> Your rod and your staff, <S%H4938><s%> they comfort me. <S%H5162><s%>

You prepare <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in the presence of my enemies. <S%H6887><s%> You anoint <S%H1878><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%> My cup <S%H3563><s%> runs over. <S%H7310><s%>

Surely goodness <S%H2896><s%> and loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> shall follow <S%H7291><s%> me all the days <S%H3117><s%> of my life, <S%H2416><s%> and I will dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> forever. <S%H753><s%>
